trans-unit.source: Represents a subscription to a timer event.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> objects are added to the timer queue associated with a workflow instance in order to send a message to a specific <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> at a specified time.

When the time specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> is reached, the workflow runtime engine sends a message containing the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>.
The timer queue associated with a workflow instance is contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>.

You can examine <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo> objects returned by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine which activities are waiting on a specific <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> both use timer event subscriptions to provide part of their functionality.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> of a workflow instance and the specified expiration <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref>.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>.
Property
Value
A string representation of the system-supplied <xref:System.Guid> for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A>.
A system-supplied <xref:System.Guid>.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance, specified by `workflowInstanceId`.
The <xref:System.DateTime> specified by `expiresAt`.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> is initialized to a string representation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> by this constructor.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> of the workflow instance associated with this subscription.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that represents the time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) at which the timer associated with this subscription is expected to expire.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> class by using the specified subscription Id, the specified <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> of a workflow instance, and the specified expiration <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref>.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>.
Property
Value
A string representation of the <xref:System.Guid> specified by `timerId`.
The <xref:System.Guid> specified by `timerId`.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance, specified by `workflowInstanceId`.
The <xref:System.DateTime> specified by `expiresAt`.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> is initialized to a string representation of `timerId` by this constructor.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> for this subscription.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> of the workflow instance for which this subscription was created.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that represents the time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) at which the timer for this subscription is expected to expire.
Gets the expected expiration time of the timer associated with this subscription.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that represents the time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) at which the timer associated with this subscription is expected to expire.

Represents the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> sends a message to when the timer subscription expires.
The <xref href="System.IComparable"></xref> interface for a <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> object.
Unique identifier that represents a timer event
<xref href="System.Guid"></xref> representing the unique identifier for a timer event
Identifier of the workflow associated with the timer subscription
<xref href="System.Guid"></xref> representing the unique identifier for the workflow associated with the timer subscription.
